__construct.name: __construct
__construct.short_desc: Create a new database connection instance.

useDefaultQueryGrammar.name: useDefaultQueryGrammar
useDefaultQueryGrammar.short_desc: Set the query grammar to the default implementation.

useDefaultSchemaGrammar.name: useDefaultSchemaGrammar
useDefaultSchemaGrammar.short_desc: Set the schema grammar to the default implementation.

useDefaultPostProcessor.name: useDefaultPostProcessor
useDefaultPostProcessor.short_desc: Set the query post processor to the default implementation.

getSchemaBuilder.name: getSchemaBuilder
getSchemaBuilder.short_desc: Get a schema builder instance for the connection.

table.name: table
table.short_desc: Begin a fluent query against a database table.

raw.name: raw
raw.short_desc: Get a new raw query expression.

selectOne.name: selectOne
selectOne.short_desc: Run a select statement and return a single result.

select.name: select
select.short_desc: Run a select statement against the database.

insert.name: insert
insert.short_desc: Run an insert statement against the database.

update.name: update
update.short_desc: Run an update statement against the database.

delete.name: delete
delete.short_desc: Run a delete statement against the database.

statement.name: statement
statement.short_desc: Execute an SQL statement and return the boolean result.

affectingStatement.name: affectingStatement
affectingStatement.short_desc: Run an SQL statement and get the number of rows affected.

unprepared.name: unprepared
unprepared.short_desc: Run a raw, unprepared query against the PDO connection.

prepareBindings.name: prepareBindings
prepareBindings.short_desc: Prepare the query bindings for execution.

transaction.name: transaction
transaction.short_desc: Execute a Closure within a transaction.

pretend.name: pretend
pretend.short_desc: Execute the given callback in "dry run" mode.

logQuery.name: logQuery
logQuery.short_desc: Log a query in the connection's query log.

listen.name: listen
listen.short_desc: Register a database query listener with the connection.

getDoctrineColumn.name: getDoctrineColumn
getDoctrineColumn.short_desc: Get a Doctrine Schema Column instance.

getDoctrineSchemaManager.name: getDoctrineSchemaManager
getDoctrineSchemaManager.short_desc: Get the Doctrine DBAL schema manager for the connection.

getDoctrineConnection.name: getDoctrineConnection
getDoctrineConnection.short_desc: Get the Doctrine DBAL database connection instance.

getReadPdo.name: getReadPdo
getReadPdo.short_desc: Get the current PDO connection used for reading.

setReadPdo.name: setReadPdo
setReadPdo.short_desc: Set the PDO connection used for reading.

getConfig.name: getConfig
getConfig.short_desc: Get an option from the configuration options.

getQueryGrammar.name: getQueryGrammar
getQueryGrammar.short_desc: Get the query grammar used by the connection.

setQueryGrammar.name: setQueryGrammar
setQueryGrammar.short_desc: Set the query grammar used by the connection.

getSchemaGrammar.name: getSchemaGrammar
getSchemaGrammar.short_desc: Get the schema grammar used by the connection.

setSchemaGrammar.name: setSchemaGrammar
setSchemaGrammar.short_desc: Set the schema grammar used by the connection.

getPostProcessor.name: getPostProcessor
getPostProcessor.short_desc: Get the query post processor used by the connection.

setPostProcessor.name: setPostProcessor
setPostProcessor.short_desc: Set the query post processor used by the connection.

getEventDispatcher.name: getEventDispatcher
getEventDispatcher.short_desc: Get the event dispatcher used by the connection.

setEventDispatcher.name: setEventDispatcher
setEventDispatcher.short_desc: Set the event dispatcher instance on the connection.

setCacheManager.name: setCacheManager
setCacheManager.short_desc: Set the cache manager instance on the connection.

pretending.name: pretending
pretending.short_desc: Determine if the connection in a "dry run".

getFetchMode.name: getFetchMode
getFetchMode.short_desc: Get the default fetch mode for the connection.

setFetchMode.name: setFetchMode
setFetchMode.short_desc: Set the default fetch mode for the connection.

enableQueryLog.name: enableQueryLog
enableQueryLog.short_desc: Enable the query log on the connection.

disableQueryLog.name: disableQueryLog
disableQueryLog.short_desc: Disable the query log on the connection.

getDatabaseName.name: getDatabaseName
getDatabaseName.short_desc: Get the name of the connected database.

setDatabaseName.name: setDatabaseName
setDatabaseName.short_desc: Set the name of the connected database.

getTablePrefix.name: getTablePrefix
getTablePrefix.short_desc: Get the table prefix for the connection.

setTablePrefix.name: setTablePrefix
setTablePrefix.short_desc: Set the table prefix in use by the connection.

withTablePrefix.name: withTablePrefix
withTablePrefix.short_desc: Set the table prefix and return the grammar.
